blog.name: starkinbound
blog.title: Marvel Blog // Tony Stark Is The Strongest Avenger
blog.description: || Kiera || tracking tag #starkinbound || ANTI ST*RKER || main; @snapmyneckandcallmeloki || join my server lads; https://discord.gg/VvCMYdk

tags: could go more in depth but
summary: Please explain why Tony Stark is, as you believe, a good person and not just a war profiteer
question: Please explain why Tony Stark is, as you believe, a good person and not just a war profiteer
answer:
I’m gonna try to give short points for this but people have definitely explained it better!

Tony Stark’s story arc is one of redemption; it emphasises how someone can be the change that they desire, even when that change is putting an end to their own mistakes. First of all, that can resonate with anyone, no matter how big or small their personal connection with it may be. Was he, at first, a good person? Absolutely not. He DID profit off war, and that was definitely something that wasn’t right. Should it have taken personal experience for him to have realised it was wrong? Well, no. But everyone realises things in their own way. What matters is he knew a change needed to be made, and so he scarified everything he knew - his business, his friends, his reputation, his family name - to make that change.

Tony did what many of us fail to do on a daily basis. He woke the fuck up. He rose up to the challenge of being a better person and doing his best to get rid of the weapons manufacturing aspect of Stark Industries. You could argue, “but iron man 2, but this movie, but that movie…” Yes, you’re right! But you’re also missing an important message with that too, and that’s the fact that your past and your mistakes can creep up on you and bite you in the ass at any point. That doesn’t mean that you didn’t try to grow as a person, and Tony always tried to stop them from using the weapons, and stop them from harming people because (after his realisation in IM1) the last thing he wanted was for something he created to harm innocent people. Or even guilty people, to a degree. He didn’t want his legacy to be weapons, military technology and murder like his father.

Another thing to point out is how Tony is a brilliant representation of mental health in mainstream media. Something else in his arc is that he struggles severely with a variety of issues ranging from terrible PTSD, to losing friends despite his best efforts. There are many vulnerable moments that I feel aren’t appreciated enough and are extremely overlooked in this fandom. He has panic attacks, his care towards the rest of the avengers is ignored most of the time because of his ‘ego’ and he is almost driven by the fear of letting people down, or letting them get hurt. Again; this is in mainstream media and that’s really important. Let me also clarify - I’m someone who can connect with Tony a lot. That ego of his? From experience I can certainly say it’s just a facade. And this facade makes him seem dislikeable to friends, the media and family. AND! His relationship with his FAMILY! He grew up with a cold, calculating father who he never knew cared about him. This is yet another thing that many people in the audience will be able to relate to. And when he found out Bucky killed the same man that treated him like he was inferior, he fought to defend him (and his mother, of course).

While we are on the topic of relationships; let’s talk about Rhodey, Pepper, Happy and Peter. These are the people that he’s met along the way (feel free to add more) who have changed him, taught him lessons, and who he cares for deeply. He may not be the best at showing it, sure, but that man would die for Pepper. He’d defend Rhodey until death. He’d watch over Peter to keep the kid safe without a moment’s hesitation. And he’d keep Happy employed and secure for as long as the business could run. Not to mention, he provided so much for the avengers (and let me stress, it was pretty much thrown back in his face). Protection, a home, their own gear, medical services, funding, Hell their own lives.

Remember New York? The wormhole? People seem to forget he didn’t even hesitate to sacrifice his life to save an entire city. Just like Cap did with the plane at the end of CATFA. So he’d sacrifice himself for the greater good of a population.

Now, let’s talk about Peter Parker. Was bringing Peter to Germany a mistake? Yes. Absolutely. HOWEVER. As soon as Peter was down, Tony made him stop. He gave Peter the suit to keep too, just to keep him safe; would you rather a teenager booted about NY in a onesie? And in Spiderman Homecoming, he was worried sick that he had put himself at risk. He wanted Peter to stay low and safe because he’d learnt from Germany, and he knew that if Peter was harmed, Queens would potentially lose its very own vigilante.

Oh and infinity war. Tony tried to send him HOME. Peter being there was his own choice, not Tony’s. Tony Literally said to FRIDAY “send him home.” That definitely shows he learnt from another mistake. Also: another sacrifice. He took the spaceship away from earth so no one got hurt. So WAR didn’t break out. Is that something someone who wanted to profit from war would do?

Tl;dr - Tony cares, struggles with very HUMANE issues and tries his best to make up for the mistakes he’s made. And of course it’s only realistic that he can’t do that perfectly, hence some of the antagonists he faces post IM1.

blog.name: zajelimilogin
blog.title: Dream a little bigger, darling.
blog.description:
Woman.
Determined.
Braided.

What else?
Normality is overrated.
Wibbly wobbly, timey wimey.
Black, two sugars. I'll be upstairs.
One more miracle, please.

You mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling.

summary: The Avengers as Conversations I've Overheard at School #2
title: The Avengers as Conversations I've Overheard at School #2
body:
Tony: I'm fine. I can do stress. I am a calm person.
Two minutes later
Tony, in tears: Everything is going wrong, everybody needs to shut up and fuck off. I'm fine, I'm just going to die. I said fuCK OFF CLINT!

dialogue.name: Tony
dialogue.label: Tony:
dialogue.phrase: I'm fine. I can do stress. I am a calm person.

dialogue.name: Tony, in tears
dialogue.label: Tony, in tears:
dialogue.phrase: Everything is going wrong, everybody needs to shut up and fuck off. I'm fine, I'm just going to die. I said fuCK OFF CLINT!

summary: https://archiveofourown.org/works/16376729/chapters/38778884  Title: Hurting Summary: Peter often hurt himself. Relationships:...
body:
https://archiveofourown.org/works/16376729/chapters/38778884

Title: Hurting

Summary: Peter often hurt himself.

Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark

Chapter: 2/2

It’s so late and for that I’m sorry. I started writing it and then realised that I still hadn’t written my presentation for my speaking exam which is next week (wish me luck! I still haven’t finished it lmao) so I have put this off for so long.

Anyway, this is it. It’s not as long as I wanted it to be so maybe there will be another chapter? For now it’s finished though :) Enjoy!

This hasn’t been beta read (just yet) because I just wanted to get this out so there may be mistakes :) It’ll probably be read by her soon so expect some edits of some kind because I usually make mistakes - English is not my strong suit in school lmao

- Pegs 🌻

summary:
Steve: Thor, I wanted to tell you something... Tony and I are officially going out
Thor: That's wonderful Captain of America!...
body:
Steve: Thor, I wanted to tell you something… Tony and I are officially going out

Thor: That’s wonderful Captain of America! Let us celebrate this occasion!

—

Tony: Hey Nat, just to let you know, me and Steve are going out now

Natasha: Haha is he blind?

blog.name: my-ao3feed-trial
blog.title: ao3feed trial
blog.description: just a blog where I try to figure out how to set an ao3feed

title: Time Bomb
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2yXcuAE

by ShaneColton

Tony Stark is not okay.
The events of Civil War have left him broken and the culminaton of all the trauma he’s suffered since Afghanistan have become to much to handle.
He’s alone, more alone than he has ever been, and Tony doesn’t fuction well on his own.
This is a story about brokenness and depression, being surrounded by a darkness so thick it chokes the life from him. But this is also a story about rebuilding a life that’s worth living, recovery, and finding the light at the end of the tunnel.

“What the machines couldn’t fix was the nerve damage and scar tissue, the drug habit he’d thought he’d left behind twenty years ago, and the need to dull his pain with alcohol.”

(Mind the tags. They will be updated as the story progresses.)

Words: 1715, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Jarvis, Pepper Potts, Tony’s bots, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Peter Parker, Harley Keener, mentions of Steve Rogers
  • Relationships: Past Tony Stark/Pepper Potts
  • Additional Tags: Jarvis Never Died, Vision is only a small part Jarvis, Nightmares, Trauma, Injury, Panic Attacks, Anxiety, Alcohol Abuse/Alcoholism, Drug Abuse, Depression, Suicidal Thoughts, Depersonalization Disorder, Body Trauma, Past Torture, Triggers, Post-Captain America: Civil War (Movie), Pre-Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie)


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2yXcuAE

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Reluctant Matchmaking 101
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2RIexQi

by Tabbikatt

“So, you’re –” Bucky pauses. He must have heard wrong because there’s no way. There is no fucking way he heard that right. He scrubs a hand down his face. “You’re telling me that out of all the people in this entire godforsaken school, you have a thing for Tony Stark?”

Steve blushes, shifting a little. He’s sitting cross-legged on Bucky’s bed, his back resting against the wall. “I mean –”

“Don’t get me wrong, Stevie,” Bucky drawls, rolling his eyes. He slumps in his own seat across the way, resting his elbows on the back of the chair, “I know you like brunettes. I mean, you dated Peg for, like, a year, and then there was that weird fling with Johnny –”

“He dyes it, thanks much,” Steve mutters.

“But holy shit, Stark will ruin you.”

Words: 2853, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, Peter Parker, Wade Wilson, James “Bucky” Barnes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Thor, Jennifer Walters, Loki (Marvel), Clint Barton, Kate Bishop
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Peter Parker/Wade Wilson, James “Bucky” Barnes/Natasha Romanov, Bruce Banner/Thor, Probably others but those are the main ones
  • Additional Tags: POV Multiple, This a total self-indulgence fic, Yes this is another college AU, I can’t help myself for loving the college AU cliche, So face-wise I picture the MCU actors, but personality-wise I went for a sort of combination between the MCU and comics, if that makes any sense?, I didn’t want to JUST base everything off the MCU, since some characters are better written in the movies than others


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2RIexQi

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

blog.name: secretsaway
blog.title: random marvel posts
blog.description: doing incorrect marvel stuff and enjoying it.

summary:
Tony and Stephen fell asleep while watching movie on boys’ sleepover. 
Ned: Look at those softies. Remember the golden rule of a...
body:
Tony and Stephen fell asleep while watching movie on boys’ sleepover.


Ned: Look at those softies. Remember the golden rule of a sleepover?

Peter: Draw something weird on faces of those who fell asleep first?

Ned: Exactly.

Ned: ….

Ned: Well, they already have weird beards on their faces tho

Peter: true.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Mages, Miko, and Mechanical Men - Oh my!
title: Mages, Miko, and Mechanical Men - Oh my!
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ox2LWI

by Genuka

Kagome never thought she would face a battle in her native time period, or rather she never thought she would face one that had absolutely nothing to do with her and her friends from five hundred years in the past. What the hell did they do to this kid with a lightning bolt scar on his forehead and why do these idiots think she and the strange American man are related to their beat up torture victim?

Here’s hoping that it really is nothing to do with the stupid jewel that is her duty. If they turn out to actually be family though momma has some ‘splaining to do!

Words: 6058, Chapters: 2/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: InuYasha - A Feudal Fairy Tale, Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling, The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Severus Snape, Tony Stark, Higurashi Kagome
  • Relationships: Undecided -Surprise
  • Additional Tags: Tags May Change, Warnings May Change, Magic, Sane Tom Riddle, Sane Voldemort (Harry Potter), Implied/Referenced Child Abuse, Past Abuse, Work In Progress, Bunny Farm Escapee, Random Updates, Potter Luck
